input.sentences: this man and his friend are on their way to a concert !
the line to get into the concert is very long .
the man 's friend is very excited because he has never been to a concert before .
when they get inside they must wait a little bit longer .
the band is on | and the show is great !
output.sentences: Come on Carl, let's get to that concert.
Holy, moly, will you look at that line?
